very fun game love running the killer 10 out of 10

short answer:
i wouldn't say the development team is terrible, maybe just a little... well, they've done a pretty good job so far, if you know what i mean.

factual answer:
i mean, they've done a pretty good job so far. i think they should probably nerf pig though. jokes aside, it's fun i guess. toxic endgame chat for the most part though, it was for a pretty good reason though. i probably shouldn't have used noed with infinite tier 3 but it is what it is.

refreshing new kind of game where 1v4 actually feels fair. I know that it doesnt sound like it, but the game is so balanced without any one killer or survivor having that great of an advantage its really worth a play!

Great game to play with friends. I personally think Survivor and Killer is pretty balanced. I enjoy the DLCs but they really aren't necessary to really enjoy the game. Using the Perks to customize the way you play is always a plus to me. I will always recommend this game to friends. I am a little worried about the long-term effects on my space bar though XD
i love it so much and the best part is when you enter a match after 32.4 minutes of waiting , and then you get killed by The Huntress in 42 seconds.

top. notch. game. It's great to kill your friends and be hunted by your friends. The screams and bloodlust are genuine.

PÃ©simo, Este juego deberÃ­a ser llamado el â€œlobby by buglightâ€, grÃ¡ficos feos, horrible jugabilidad, mapas mal diseÃ±ados. Los asesinos tienen todas las ventajas y siempre saben dÃ³nde estas, casi como si usaran walls, hasta para los tiempos de bÃºsqueda tienen mas ventaja. Terrible, this game should be called â€œlobby by buglightâ€, ugly graphics, horrible gameplay, poorly designed maps. The killer have all the advantages and they always know where you are, almost as if they used walls, even for the match search they have more advantage. It never matches with people of your rank, there is no balancing. Many Bugs and many Hacks. It looks like they are only thinking about selling skins and characters.
i like this game,but now is a gabage

un buen juego con una comunidad mixta, te pueden tocar gente normal o puros toxicos subnormales. la curva de aprendizaje es muy alta almenos del lado del asesino , el juego es insano con jugadores nuevos ya que te puede emparejar con gente con 1000 horas teniendo tu solo unas cuantas, no esperes un tutorial porque el que tiene es tan malo que te lo resumo de esta forma: si eres survivor tienes que sobrevivir y si eres asesino debes asesinar, si, asi de estupido es el tutorial. tiene una gran variedad de asesinos y supervivientes con cada uno 3 perks enseÃ±ables, y a mano de esto viene el problema ya que ni los propios desarrolladores saben como equilibrar el juego (tiene sentido ya que no existe un solo perk sino que tambien depende del mapa o del tipo de gente que te toque). pero mi recomendacion es que si te gusta sigue jugando y aprende a como loopear y no te desanimes si pierdes mucho que asi es como aprendes
the wait times can be really annoying but it's really fun
El mejor juego de la historia amigo
Great Game, hopefully lots more to come. excited to play this game more and see what it has to offer in the following years
buen juego pero esta mal balanceado como el LOL pero a la quinta potencia.
si te gusta que te escupan y maltraten,jugalo
juego brutal pero toxico lo que recomiendo es toxiquear al maximo hasta tener las mejores perks de los killers
this game takes you of the road and in to tunnels
Good game, hard to start but after playing about 20-30 hours i have enough bloodpoints to get skills and everything to balance out survivor V killer. a fun polished game :)

It's sad how the developer killed the game.. so many bugs after patches, parties are P2P based, so ping can be very high sometimes. I started playing like 5 months ago... now I would really like a refund. If you plan to play this game premade with friends, the probability to have fun is quite high... I do not recommend going solo queue, cause the game isn't made to allow both, survivors and killers to have fun.

Eigentlich ein tolles Spiel, aber dann sind die DevÂ´s auf die tolle Idee gekommen die 5s Endurance nach dem Abhaken zu "verschenken" damit nicht mehr so viel getunnelt wird. Was ist passiert: Die meisten Killer warten einfach 5s ab und tunneln dir dann die Seele aus dem Leib, da keiner mehr Geliehene Zeit spielt.
Keine Ahnung warum es Killer im Moment nÃ¶tig haben zu Tunneln oder zu Campen, aber es gibt viel zu viele von denen. Ich bin selber nicht der beste Killer, aber ohne Tunneln und Campen komme ich bei fast jedem Spiel auf +2 kills.
Das geilste sind aber die lausigen Internetverbindungen, die das Spiel zu lÃ¤sst: so ein schÃ¶ner Schwung (Maus 1) der dich aus 5m Entfernung trifft verleiht dem Spiel noch mehr SpielspaÃŸ (Achtung: Sarkasmus).
An die DevÂ´s: rallt ihr es nicht? Wie kann man ein Spiel so im Ungleichgewicht halten??? Nach jeder "BalanceÃ¤nderung" wird die schlechtere Seite so gebufft, dass diese das Spiel komplett dominiert. Definitely an enjoyable game once you get the hang of it. But the perk dependency is horrific and makes mainly killer a trial of anger and un-enjoyment. Playing with friends is fun even in customs. a good buy when its on sale but a risky purchase for the full price. Oh and all of the good perks are locked behind a pay wall unless they come into the shrine of secrets which is rare.
Great game. Just play with the right friends or else they will leave you hanging. 40/5
